Text:
I'm finding the future to be quite agreeable so far.
And it's so intriguing.
What's intriguing about it?

Well...the fountain in the city center, the women
chatting amongst themselves on benches, the way the
shopkeepers call out to passersbyâ€”
Basically all of it.

Huh. I don't get it. To me, this is all pretty
run-of-the-mill.

But that's what makes it interesting. Everything is
so different from the era I know.

For starters, the way that fountain is constantly
flowing for no real purpose seems extremely wasteful.
Water is a precious thing, you see.

Furthermore, back in my day any woman eating in the
streets without the company of a man would be called
terribly shameless.

And what about the shopkeeps trying to grab people's
attention? Isn't that at least normal?

...I've never seen such lively people in a city
before. Everyone in my time seems somewhat weary,
you see...

I really do think this era you call home is a nice
one.
...Now, let's keep moving.

Wait, we aren't done yet? Should we be getting back
to looking for the cores...?

Oh, what's the harm in it? I may never get another
chance to stroll around with you like this.

And you do know we'll need to leave this world to
reach the cores, yes? Did you perhaps find a
shortcut?
Fine, but only one more spot...
That's the spirit.
...Is something the matter?

Yeah. It's almost lunch time, so you wanna grab
something to eat? This place seems pretty popular.
C'mon, let's go in.
W-Wait just a moment!
What's wrong?

Don't you need to pay money for meals in these
places?
Oh...right.
We'll figure something out.

B-But! What if they're strict about etiquette inside?
I've heard stories about those kinds of restaurants.
I don't think place is quite that uptight.

And then there's thatâ€”we should be getting back to
searching for the cores.
That's what I just said!
You nervous? Hey, just checking, but...

Violet, have you ever actually been to a restaurant
before?
Nope?

However, I heard the people I used to be involved
with talk about those kinds of things.

Okay, then why not experience it for yourself since
we're here?

Look, you might not get a chance like this again.
...Right?

...I can't argue with that. Since I've come this far,
I may as well join you.

Why're you swiveling your head around like that? You
look super suspicious.
B-But!

H-Hey, is it really okay for us to go inside? W-Won't
someone get angry at us?
Who would get angry at us?
Welcome. A table for two, yes? Right this way.
*gasp*
May I take your order?

Is there something in particular you'd like to eat,
Violet?
I'll let you decide.
You sure? Okay then, we'll take two lunch courses.
Understood.
Hmm. I see you're accustomed to this type of place.
Are you upset about something?

Not in the slightest. But wouldn't you be tense if it
was your first time in a restaurant?

Oh, so you're nervous. You're more human than you
seem.
Hey, just what do you think I am?
By the way, there's something I'm curious about.
Yeah?

So the food we ordered...will they actually bring it
out to us? This is your memory, right?
That's something I want to know myself...!

â€”And this completes your order. Please enjoy your
meal.
Welp, guess that answers that.
Yes, and it smells...about right. As for the taste...
...Ah, positively delicious.
...You're right. My memory's pretty awesome.

Hehehe, now I have another thing to thank you for.
Had I been alone, I never would've been able to
experience this.
Really? Well, I'm glad you did, then.
Still...I'm kinda surprised.
Oh, about what?

For someone who's never been to this kind of place,
you sure do eat cleanly. Your manners aren't that
bad, either.

Well, I used to get scolded terribly for about all
the extra cleaning I would cause if I made a mess
when I ate. So in a sense I can't really help but be
neat.

My meals were a far cry from the fare they serve
here, though. It would be more accurate to call them
"feed" rather than "food".

...That isn't a very fun topic, I know. I'm sorry for
wiping the smile from your face.

Hey, no worries. It just made me think that some
people have it rough is all.

Since we have this nice meal before us, what say we
speak of something more lighthearted?
Hmm, like what?
Let's see... Your family, perhaps?
Uh, yeah, let's talk about something else!
Whew, I'm stuffed.

Looks like you can get full even inside a memory. You
learn something new every day.
Sounds like someone is really enjoying himself.

So...what do we do next? I don't have any money,
I'm afraid...
Don't worry, I'll pay.
Now lessee, where's that bill...
Is something wrong?

H-Hey, did you hear me? Is everything all right?
You're starting to make me nervous, being all quiet
like that.

If I'd known this was gonna happen, I would've asked
Gamma for extra spending money.
...Huh?
Time to go!
Huh?! Wh-What?!
Just run for it! To the end of the world!
Wh-What?! Hold on! Wait! Don't leave me!
